results.content: I like the fact that the instructor gets right to the point. It's basic, yes, but I was taking a web development course and I had already passed the JS portion but none of this information had been presented in that other course so I really appreciate that this course has been created. It does shed way more light on the 'basics' and fundamentals of JavaScript. Thank you for putting this course together.

results.content: I explored the fundamental concepts, including JavaScript placement, output functions, transition to working with arithmetic operators, math functions, arrays, sorting, conditional statements and loops. I also learn to work with events and functions. Overall it was a good experience.

results.content:
I think that this course could be better with a few changes:
1) Use a modern text editor.
2) If the lecturer would be more engaging, it feels like an AI is reading something from Wikipedia.
3) Projects, projects, and more projects. It's easier to learn by doing.
results.content_html:
I think that this course could be better with a few changes:
1) Use a modern text editor.
2) If the lecturer would be more engaging, it feels like an AI is reading something from Wikipedia.
3) Projects, projects, and more projects. It's easier to learn by doing.
